column5: With Massey’s Master of Science (Horticultural Science) you can take advantage of Massey University’s 80 years of research and teaching experience in agriculture and horticulture to create your own innovative research project. Massey University’s horticultural science programme is the most research focussed in New Zealand.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course. Students/Documents/Programmes-Available-to-Internationals.pdf
